name: Timesplosion
description:
Timesplosion is a time-loop based action platformer with a focus on immense destruction, incredible speed, and being undeniably unstoppable!

A and S to Move

W / Space to Jump

Mouse Click for Menu Options

Other Controls are stated in game

This was made for the Juice Jam with the theme Don't Stop.

I... uh... joined half way through and only had three days to put together a game. I think it turned out well and I can't wait to see people's thoughts!

I plan on further developing this concept into a much fuller game so stay tuned for updates whenever I release a new patch or feature! (After the Jam ends, of course.)

Also this is my first Game Jam! I’m so excited and nervous lol

Once the Jam ends I will release some patches for the various glitches in the game.
